Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement SELF_PICKUP and HOME_DELIVERY order flows with OTP verification

- Add deliveryType field to orders (SELF_PICKUP, HOME_DELIVERY)
- Fix deliveryType mapping in OrderResponse, ShopService, and DeliveryPartnerController
- Add SELF_PICKUP_COLLECTED status for self-pickup orders
- Implement OTP verification for driver pickup (HOME_DELIVERY only)
- Prevent shop owners from marking HOME_DELIVERY as delivered (driver-only)
- Add separate handover button for SELF_PICKUP orders
- Remove "Out for Delivery" button from PREPARING status
- Improve order details UI spacing and layout to prevent pixel overflow
- Add database migration for SELF_PICKUP_COLLECTED status constraint
- Update delivery partner app to use localhost for local development

Backend Changes:
- OrderService: Add validation to prevent shop owners from marking HOME_DELIVERY as DELIVERED
- OrderController: Fix verify-pickup-otp endpoint to only accept HOME_DELIVERY orders
- ShopService: Add missing deliveryType field mapping in convertToOrderResponse
- DeliveryPartnerController: Add deliveryType to all order endpoints
- Order entity: Add SELF_PICKUP_COLLECTED to OrderStatus enum

Shop Owner App Changes:
- OrderCard: Add onHandoverSelfPickup and onVerifyPickupOTP callbacks
- orders_screen: Separate buttons for SELF_PICKUP (Handover) vs HOME_DELIVERY (Verify OTP)
- order_details_screen: Improve card spacing (16px â†’ 24px) and fix header layout
- Remove OUT_FOR_DELIVERY buttons for shop owners (driver-only status)
